string.text:
A worn leather wallet for banknotes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Currency Storage

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety reasons, but many stalkers keep at least a few rouble in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Currency
